channel.title: Best way to get players?
channel.description: Does anyone know the best way to get players? I am sorta gifted with java i can learn things on my own.... I did apply for a moparscape sponsorship but they don't accept people til the first, (i know it's tomorrow.) but what I offered is the min of what can be offered money wise and someone will probably out bid me. I am not that creative when it comes to advertising ( I use to be, but as I grew older my imagination disappeared.)

rsps communities?

A good community.

item.title: Best way to get players?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Si Force:

I can tell you for certain that recolouring item names won’t attract players to your server. They want content, not colours. Try adding a creative mini-game, quest or some type of plot to your server. Be innovative.

Recolors won’t attract players unless they’re more than just recolors. For example: There are 3, each one supporting a different combat style, and each obtained from a different quest that strains your abilities using that style.

My tip to the op is to actually put effort into your advertisement. Don’t say “Fully working dclaws, godswords,chaotic” or anything like that, 95% of servers have all those now, advertise your unique content rather than 2 pages of shit that comes with almost every starter PI released.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get players?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

always stay active, so many players will quit if they think the owner is inactive and not taking care of the server. you can go from 100 to 30 easily if you’re an inactive owner.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get players?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I hosted a leeched PI to over 600 players, it’s all about no lag, great staff and a very smoothly and cleanly run server. Content is important, however it isn’t necessary in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get players?
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Doesn’t youtube require having more then one person on the game? Right now there is one player that has been playing this passed two or three weeks we been up but no-one really joining, I have the client coder, which he loves costumes, we found out how to recolor the item names, so now rares are colored yellow (for something unique.) and set pieces like barrows are colored blue.

The most views I ever got on youtube were 4 I believe. I extremely lack the advertisement gene. I don’t care to be out advertised, just having like 10 players on at peek and like 4 or 5 off peek will keep me satisfied and continuing to proceed to code and keep my server up.

I also am in college (which funny enough, I just found out the fall 2012 semester is half-way over and I might pass. lol) I have tried to ask for someone who could advertise on development threads but with no success of a reply.

Also: there is no donations on my server. there is no reason for donations. I can pay for the VPS and I’d like any player be able to experience all items/places there is to offer.

I am probable changing donator to Good Grades you get to have this or if you are a loyal player… Something that anyone can get - I don’t want to take anything ingame away from a player just cause they can’t offered it.

Read full topic

item.title: Best way to get players?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Youtube advertising.

There arent many options if you don’t have money, you’ll basically always be out-advertised
